@graph.name: Coconut Rava Ladoo and Burfi - Coconut Semolina Cashew Sweet Balls. Vegan Recipe Glutenfree option - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Coconut Rava Ladoo and Burfi. Vegan Gluten-free Indian dessert balls and bars flavored with cardamom. Dairy-free Recipe

itemListElement.name: Coconut Rava Ladoo and Burfi – Coconut Semolina Cashew Sweet Balls. Vegan Recipe Glutenfree option

@graph.name: Coconut Rava Ladoo and Burfi - Coconut Semolina Cashew Sweet Balls. Vegan Recipe Glutenfree option
@graph.description: Coconut Rava Ladoo and Burfi. Vegan Gluten-free Indian dessert balls and bars flavored with cardamom. Dairy-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup Semolina flour (or Brown rice flour for Glutenfree)
1 Tablespoon Coconut oil (optional. Omit to make Oilfree)
2 Tablespoons chopped cashew pieces (optional. Omit to make nutfree)
1/2 cup ground raw sugar (or use jaggery powder)
1/8-1/4 teaspoon cardamom powder (depends on how much you love cardamom:)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, dry roast the semolina on medium-low heat for 6-8 minutes until the color changes and it gets fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, dry roast the semolina on medium-low heat for 6-8 minutes until the color changes and it gets fragrant.

recipeInstructions.text: Using a blender/processor, blend the coconut flakes to make coarse coconut flour.
recipeInstructions.name: Using a blender/processor, blend the coconut flakes to make coarse coconut flour.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the blended coconut, coconut oil, salt and cashew pieces to the pan. Mix well and roast for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the blended coconut, coconut oil, salt and cashew pieces to the pan. Mix well and roast for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: (Coconut oil and cashew pieces can be left out to make nut free and oilfree)
recipeInstructions.name: (Coconut oil and cashew pieces can be left out to make nut free and oilfree)

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, in another pan, make the sugar syrup.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, in another pan, make the sugar syrup.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all syrup ingredients and bring to a boil over medium heat. Continue to cook at medium low until one thread consistency- 230 to 235 degrees F / 110ºc.(a few minutes).
recipeInstructions.name: Add all syrup ingredients and bring to a boil over medium heat. Continue to cook at medium low until one thread consistency- 230 to 235 degrees F / 110ºc.(a few minutes).

recipeInstructions.text: Add the hot sugar syrup to the roasting dry ingredients and mix well to form a lumpy mixture. (Best results when both contents are hot)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the hot sugar syrup to the roasting dry ingredients and mix well to form a lumpy mixture. (Best results when both contents are hot)

recipeInstructions.text: Take off heat. Cool for 2-3 minutes and form balls - Ladoo. Spray a little water if the mixture is too crumbly.
recipeInstructions.name: Take off heat. Cool for 2-3 minutes and form balls - Ladoo. Spray a little water if the mixture is too crumbly.

recipeInstructions.text: Or Press immediately into parchment lined or greased baking pan to make Burfi. (I used an 8 by 4 inch pan.) The mixture gets too crumbly as it cools. So shape when still warm-hot. Handle carefully.
recipeInstructions.name: Or Press immediately into parchment lined or greased baking pan to make Burfi. (I used an 8 by 4 inch pan.) The mixture gets too crumbly as it cools. So shape when still warm-hot. Handle carefully.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut into squares when still warm. The bars will harden as they cool.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut into squares when still warm. The bars will harden as they cool.

recipeInstructions.text: Break into pieces when cool. Store in airtight container for upto a week.
recipeInstructions.name: Break into pieces when cool. Store in airtight container for upto a week.
